entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @AdamParkhomenko @steeletalk The sad 😔 reality is many at this protest will die due to the sheer contagiousness of covid-19 and when infected only then will it dawn on them how valuable life is. And those who infected the others will continue to speak and deny the virus 🦠 its Human nature #dumb and #dumber
